system.domainDescription:
The ogre can temporarily cause the miasma to accelerate its effects.

 • The touch of the ogre can rapidly rot and decay objects, plant matter, and constructions, destroying them and dissolving them into mud and slime. • Exorcists inside the miasma start to superficially rot if they spend scenes there - hair falling out, sunken skin, dead skin cells, nails falling out, etc. They recover from this damage after the mission. 

• As a tension move the ogre can cause an exorcist inside the miasma to start decaying. They gain the Rotting affliction (see afflictions).

 • Exorcists subtract 1 from all their healing rolls.
